name: yareg/getid3
description: This fork of GetId3 library updates to PSR-2 / PSR-4 CS, adds namespaces and makes it installable by composer.

suggest.ext-rar: RAR extension is required for RAR archive module.
suggest.ext-exif: EXIF extension is required for graphic modules.
suggest.ext-mysqli: MySQLi extension is required in order to use MySQL database as cache storage.
suggest.ext-sqlite: SQLite extension is required in order to use SQLite database as cache storage.
suggest.ext-dba: DBA extension is required in order to use DBA database as cache storage.
